xtiny-doc-page.title: Jext : Jext Menu
xtiny-doc-page.paragraph: The Jext menu contains items specific to Jext (version and plugin information).

menu.title: Contents
menu.item: Displays the Jext "about" box. It contains useful when you want to report a bug since it shows the Jext version and build. The Jext version follows this format: major.minor.revision (ex: 2.6.1). The build number is the more important of the two because it is more precise. The Build number follows this format: major.minor.revision.fix. Bugs will be fixed more quickly if you specify the build number.

Displays a dialog which lists the installed plugins, their names, their release numbers, and their authors, useful when you need to report a bug to the plugin author. You can also enable/disable plugins by ticking/unticking the check boxes on the left.
